V1.1.4 (2015-08-18)
Work around for some devices running 5.0 that were corrupting gloabl data for some reason.

Updated plot submit messages.

Bug fixes.

V1.1.3 (2015-06-29)
Added Quick Climate feature.

Changed landpotential link address on Review screen.

V1.1.2 (2015-06-18)
Fix for checkbox rendering on some pre-4.2 devices.

V1.1.1 (2015-06-18)
Fixed a problem with compass display on Lollipop.

Fixed a bug that was erasing text fields on reorientation for new plots on Name screen.

V1.1.0 (2015-06-12)
Display photo filename rather than \"Not uploaded\" on Review screen for unsubmitted plots.

New values for LandCover categories. Removed Water category.

Removed Grazed toggle from LandCover screen.

Added link to landpotential.org on Review page for uploaded plots.

Verify that GPS is available before initiating location function. Changed GPS accuracy threshold to 10m. Shortened GPS refresh interval to 5 seconds. Added interval counter with fail mode when threshold reached (12, for one minute total).

Added new LandUse screen for recording grazing types.

SoilHorizon navigation is now more wizard-like: cannot proceed to next depth until current depth is complete.

Removed Restrictive Layer as Rock Fragment category. Replaced with data entry fields for depth of bedrock or other cessation of digging.

PlotID screen will show complete without Organization filled in.

Moved credentials to a string resource file for exclusion from public repositories.

V1.0.1 (2015-04-12)
Initial public release

V1.0.0 (2015-04-10)
Release Candidate.
